text: This video can not be playedA training centre in New York has dance, vocal, acting and Korean language classes for those who want to become K-pop stars. BBC News went to Manhattan to meet some of the hopefuls who want to follow in the footsteps of BTS.This video has been optimised for mobile viewing on the BBC News app. The BBC News app is available from the Apple App Store for iPhone and Google Play Store for Android.
title: Can this girl from the Bronx become the next K-pop star
